title: What are good songs about flying? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song Fly by Sleeping with Sirens. I like it because it’s nice and simple at first and then it just keeps getting better and better. I love the way it sounds and the way it explains things, I love listening to this song. The way the words come together with the instruments being played in the background just sounds absolutely amazing to me. I fell in love with the band Sleeping with Sirens a while ago and I still listen to them constantly because I love them so much. I really recommend the band Sleeping with Sirens to you!

Maybe a little biased!! I will try and think of some others :) Amanda Thorpe - Flying High CD Baby Mobile wirebirds - one way ticket CD Baby Mobile Peter Stuart - Flying to You Some more well known songs: Frank Sinatra come fly with me  David Bowie - Space oddity  Diana Krall Fly me to the moon  John Denver/ Olivia Newton john - fly away  Foo fighters learn to fly
